Title: My Life as a Zucchini
Writer: Céline Sciamma (screenplay writer), Germano Zullo (contributing writer), Claude Barras (contributing writer), Morgan Navarro (contributing writer), Gilles Paris (novel), Michael Sinterniklaas (english script adaptation), Christian La Monte (english script adaptation)
Actors: Gaspard Schlatter, Sixtine Murat, Paulin Jaccoud, Michel Vuillermoz
Plot: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to a foster home with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 18 nominations.
